description_top: The description of Arabia from the Taqwīm al-buldān
title: The description of Arabia from the Taqwīm al-buldān
author: Abū al-Fidāʼ Ismāʻīl ibn ʻAlī, 1273-1331
description: 1 copy of The description of Arabia from the Taqwīm al-buldān by Abū al-Fidāʼ Ismāʻīl ibn ʻAlī, 1273-1331, with a Latin version by J. Greaves and parallel passages from Ptolemy, 2nd cent. in Greek and Latin.
provenance: The collections of John Greaves, d. 1652 and Thomas Greaves, d. 1676. Purchased by the Bodleian Library in 1678.
record_origin: Manuscript description based on the Bodleian Library's public card index of Arabic manuscripts with additional enhancements by the OCIMCO project team.
